channel.title: Demolition on DIYDeveloper.io
channel.description: Recent content in Demolition on DIYDeveloper.io

item.title: Remove wall tiles the lazy way
item.description: Ever had to remove wall tiles from plasterboard (gyprock) ? It sucks. It tears up the surface. It takes forever. Is there an easier way? Yes.

item.title: Concrete Floor Grinding for Dummies
item.description: If you want your floor to be really really flat, it’s hard to go past a concrete grinder… at least if you can get the bloody thing into your car.

item.title: Removing Floor Tiles and Thinset
item.description: How hard can it be to remove a few floor tiles? Harder than you think…. and it will take longer… and it will be dusty. I’ll show you the hard way, then the slightly less hard way.
